# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new action to start or stop translating a call with the provided data.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(coder aDecoder: NSCoder)
```

## Parameters

- **aDecoder**: An unarchiver object.
title: init(coder:)
